news_header: Monty, a giant schnauzer, won Best in Show at the Westminster Kennel Club dog show, becoming the first of his breed to do so after three years of reaching the finals. The event, held in New York City, featured over 2,500 dogs, and Monty triumphed in the Working Group before being selected as the overall winner by judge Paula Nykiel.
news_original_title: Monty the giant schnauzer wins Best in Show
news_text: The show is the second-longest sporting event in the US, now in its 149th year.
